sons: Mermeros and Pheres (or Thessalus and Alcimenes)
killed by Medea; twin sons by Hypsipyle of Lemnos
father: rightful king of Iolcus (killed or driven to suicide by Pelias)
uncle: usurper of Iolcus (killed by his own daughters through Medea's trickery)
enemies: and ultimately Medea herself after his betrayal
allies: various helpers encountered during the voyage

name: Jason
